result.reason: Allows users to configure the default inheritance behavior for newly created connections, streamlining workflows where inheritance is not always desired.
result.approach: Add a new user setting to toggle the default inheritance state. Update the ConnectionInfo constructor or initialization logic to respect this setting when creating new connection instances.
